column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2021
column14: The color is nowhere near the pictured shade. It doesn’t look like “frosty rose with tangerine undertone” (for whatever that means anyways). It looks more like a “hot tomato sauce with pasta undertone” shade...my photo doesn’t bring it across quite right, but perhaps that’s the entire issue: This shade may be difficult to convey accurately via photos. Have to throw it away - unfortunately $17 spent for nothing.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
column14: The manufacturer of this lipstick, evidently thinks it is cute the way they packaged this lipstick.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
column14: 2 stars because of the cute packaging and sleek case and it felt good on my lips. I knocked off stars because I was hoping that the color wouldn't be as orange and it was VERY orange. I was hoping for some reddish tint in there since the photo depicted a sort of burnt sienna-is color but it was too orange for my taste. With that said, I'm willing to try a different color - wish me luck!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
column14: I purchased this particular lipstick color in the hopes it would replace an Estée Lauder lipstick I loved but has been discontinued.  I am happy to say this color is near a perfect match.  Very pleased with this purchase including price and fast shipping.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
column14: Not the same color as advertised

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
column14: This is browner than it appears in the photo on my device. I would say it is the reverse of the description. It is taupe with a hint of pomegranate.  The pitfalls of ordering from a photo.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
column14: This color was an ugly orange/brown

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
column14: I have light olive skin tone and have a tough time finding a color that works well with my skin.  The Sunset Strawberry if finally a perfect shade.  I'm thrilled!
